instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-performance tool for SEOs. The UI must feel fast, dangerous, and precise. Avoid 'friendly' rounded corners. Go for 'tactical' aesthetics.
instructions_to_main_agent.css_setup: Update /app/frontend/src/index.css with the provided Tailwind config colors. Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the root or body by default.
instructions_to_main_agent.fonts: Add the Google Fonts import to /app/frontend/src/index.css or the HTML head.
instructions_to_main_agent.kill_score_implementation: Create a dedicated component for the Kill Score. It should be the most prominent visual element on the Opportunity Details page.
instructions_to_main_agent.tables: Use Shadcn Table component but strip the borders to just row dividers. Use monospace font for all metrics (CPC, Volume, DA).
instructions_to_main_agent.animations: Use 'framer-motion' for entrance animations. Stagger the table rows. Add a 'glitch' effect on hover for the main CTA.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very subtle shine.
Input fields should have a height of at least 48px (h-12) for better touch targets.
Use 'gap-6' or 'gap-8' for form layouts to avoid clutter.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background (APCA check).
